/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -fPIC -pedantic -g -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-switch -Wno-multichar -Wsequence-point -Wformat-security -mssse3 -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -pthread   CMakeFiles/rs-sensor-control.dir/rs-sensor-control.cpp.o  -o rs-sensor-control -rdynamic ../../librealsense2.so.2.16.3 -lGLU -lGL -lm -lglfw -lusb-1.0 -Wl,-rpath,/home/ruijie/Desktop/librealsense-master/Ruijie1_build:
